definition: to break (e.g. stick or bone)/a loss
to turn sth over/to turn upside down/to tip sth out (of a container)

to break/to fracture/to snap/to suffer loss/to bend/to twist/to turn/to change direction/convinced/to convert into (currency)/discount/rebate/tenth (in price)/classifier for theatrical scenes/to fold/accounts book

sentences.english: Brillo foldable toothbrushes are designed for frequent travelers.
sentences.chinese: Brillo可折叠式牙刷专为经常旅行的人设计。

sentences.english: The strap can be attached at the top or sides to convert the bag to a fold-over style.
sentences.chinese: 表带可以附加在顶部或两侧转换袋一个折叠式风格。

sentences.english: Why don't you try this foldaway rowing machine?
sentences.chinese: 不妨试试这个折叠式划船机。

sentences.english: Pucker aluminum alloyed metal series exhibition equipment.
sentences.chinese: 折叠式铝合金系列展具。

sentences.english: A side suction cover of a foldable smoke pipe is in correspondence with a material charging and discharging opening of the furnace body.
sentences.chinese: 折叠式烟管的侧吸罩与炉体的物料进出口相对。

sentences.english: Some schoolchildren in the United States have been folding cranes.
sentences.chinese: 在美国的一些学生已被折叠式起重机。

sentences.english: The pram had its hood folded down.
sentences.chinese: 这辆婴儿车上的折叠式布篷被收了下来。

sentences.english: You'll even get a free color fold-out map.
sentences.chinese: 您甚至可以免费彩色折叠式地图。

sentences.english: Matching zipper pouch, large fold-out changing pad, and insulated bottle bag.
sentences.chinese: 选配拉链袋，折叠式大变化垫，绝缘瓶袋。
不锈钢折叠式表扣闭合。

sentences.english: Because of this design is a folding carton is critical to quality assurance.
sentences.chinese: 因此设计是折叠式纸盒质量保证的至关重要的一环。
